sentences: Luis Alfredo Laguna (lah-goo'-nah) (May 1, 1926 â€“ August 1, 1984) was a Venezuelan musician and songwriter.
Born in the tiny city of Guacara, Carabobo, Laguna moved at an early age with his family to Maracay, Aragua, where he grew up and started his education.
Laguna died in 1984 at his home of Maracay at the age of 58, following complications from diabetes.
